ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Textures Expanded - Variations
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson
ModMetaData.description:
Vanilla Textures Expanded - Variations is a standalone release in the Vanilla Textures Expanded series, aiming at providing a LOT of visual variety to your vanilla bases.
So, what does it do? Basically, it provides building graphics variations for the majority of vanillaâ€™s buildings. This means every time you build a chair, the chair will have a randomized graphics. Not only that, but you can also swap the graphic of the building on command, allowing you to mix and match styles to properly decorate your base.
The mod includes more than 150 new random building graphics for 35 vanilla buildings.
